column4: So as you get more programs how can you keep hold of them all? Once they are installed how can you get a copy on disk for when you require a reformat or get a new PC?
I write everything I install into a kubtuntu-packages.txt and after a reformat etc I just install everything in that document :)

Yeah but where do you get it from. What if you get something you are relying on and the repos no longer has it. I prefer to have things tangible in my house. Not on some server where it may or may not be there when I next need it.
I don't use dodgy repositories. Just the ubuntu+kubuntu ones plus wine.
